text: The Road to Berth () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Georgiy Daneliya.Ушел из жизни режиссер Георгий ДанелияНельзя киснуть в квартирном уютеВиктор Конецкий. Путь к причалу == Plot == The film tells about a guy named Vasya, who decides to go to the Arctic. There he finds a job on the sea rescue tow. Together with the crew he will have to tow the ship Polotsk from Novaya Zemlya, which was defeated as a result of the war.Путь к причалу == Cast == * Boris Andreyev as Zosima Rosomakha * Oleg Zhakov as Georgiy Gastev * Lyubov Sokolova as Mariya * Aleksandr Metyolkin as Vaska Metyolkin (as A.
